column1: '''''russa''''' is a [[Quenya]] adjective which means "red-haired" or "russet".
It obviously derives from a [[root]] *RUS-. See [[RUSKÄ€]]<ref>{{LR
The word ''russa'' represents the color called "russet" in English, which derives from the Latin word ''[[Wiktionary:russus
column2: russus]]'' "red". Although we can't know if the similarities between the Quenya word and ''russet/russus'' were intentional by Tolkien, it is possible that they are.
